description: Chris Bolt is about to turn 30 and is weighing whether to give up his randy ways and settle into a monogamous relationship with his boyfriend, Lance Gear. His best friends, Chad Hunt and Brandon Roo, are against the idea. Hunt brags about hiring a street hustler, Milos Miroslav. In a flashback, we see Hunt feasting on Miroslavs pretty ass before fucking the daylights out of it with his massive tool.
title: Chad Hunt and Milos Miroslav
